title: What is the quickest way to recover from gout with getting any follow-up side effects?
description: Answer (1 of 11): What do you mean by "recover from gout"? Acute gout attacks are treated with: -NSAIDs (e.g. Ibuprofen in high doses up to thrice or four times a day 800 mg), not if you had had stomach aches or bleeds on a NSAID before, or have kidney problems. -old and well researched, colchic...
